original_text: And the battle was very fierce that day. And Abner and the men of Israel were beaten before the servants of David.
korean_text: 그 날에 싸움이 심히 맹렬하더니 아브넬과 이스라엘 사람들이 다윗의 신복들 앞에서 패하니라

sentences.original_text: And the battle was very fierce that day.
And Abner and the men of Israel were beaten
